trustworthiness.name: Trustworthiness
trustworthiness.description: Measures how much the NPC believes the player is honest and dependable.

scores.low: Assumes the player lies, exaggerates, or betrays.
scores.neutral: Uncertain, but gives the benefit of the doubt.
scores.high: Believes the player will follow through, even in danger.

respect.name: Respect
respect.description: Represents how much the NPC admires the player’s competence, strength, or professionalism.

scores.low: Sees player as weak, amateurish, or clumsy.
scores.high: Genuinely impressed, even follows the player’s lead.

likability.name: Likability
likability.description: How much the NPC personally enjoys the player’s company — friendliness, charm, shared values.

scores.high: Enjoys being around them, considers them a friend.

reliability.name: Reliability
reliability.description: How consistent the player is — in following up, helping, or returning.

scores.high: Always comes through, even when not expected.

emotional_bond.name: Emotional Bond
emotional_bond.description: Measures the strength of the personal relationship or history between the NPC and player.

scores.high: Feels strongly attached, may defend the player in conversation.
